Sentinel Starden: May the song of stars give you happiness. I am Starden, one of the sentinels who protect the forest, the Mother Tree Glade, and Elves of light. If my expression looks dark, then forgive me. Originally, I was a cheerful elf who enjoyed poetry and singing, but now I've lost all my former optimism since I went through the war. I had to look upon the sight of my friends being brutally killed by the Dark Elves at the "final battle of the Underground Fortress" ... I try hard to forget the fear and sorrow of those times, but I still have nightmares once in a while.
